title: You know, I don't usually say this, but Cho'Gath is probably the most broken champion in the game
body:
I mean, think about it from a design perspective. Two forms of hard AoE CC (one of which can take out entire groups of tanks or casters for 2.5 seconds), an AoE auto-attack that applies Rylai's, and an ultimate that does more true damage than Darius' 5-stack Guillotine. 

Not to mention how tanky he is and the 1:1 AP scaling on his Q. Hands down the best peeling/follow-up engager in the entire game.

If I was on the RIot balance team, I'd break his kneecaps. Nerf ChOP'Gath, Freelo of The Void
